communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm heading to UC Santa Cruz to study computer science. As a vegetarian, I try to live ethically, but society doesn't care. My online gaming is my escape, yet even there, the social hierarchy mocks me. I'm tired of being at the bottom, tired of women rejecting me. It's all rigged against us.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0020_03219e, a young man seething with anger and resentment. He's vocal about his dating failures and blames society, especially women, for his plight. His aggressive online presence is his way of fighting back against a world he feels has wronged him.
